€holoModel(2,£hqcylinder2£)€#holoParentAttachment(2,Tar,£anim_attachment_Head£) €holoParent(2,0)€holoMaterial(2,£phoenix_storms/mat/mat_phx_plastic£)€Max_speed=5000€    }€€Dist=Ragdoll:pos():distance(Home_pos)€€€if(Dist>100 | ACT)€{€if(ACT)€{€€if($Key2 & Key2)€    {€    if(Key2>47 & Key2<59)€        {€        Ragdoll:soundPlay(10,0.5,Sound[Key2-13,string])€        }€    elseif(Key2>128 & Key2<138)€        {€        Function=Key2-128€        Function_i=4000€        }€    elseif(Key2==61)€        {€        Ragdoll:soundPlay(10,0.5,£ npc/metropolice/vo/chuckle.wav£)€        }€    elseif(Key2==91)€        {€        Ragdoll:soundPlay(10,0.5,£npc/metropolice/vo/shit.wav£)€        }€    elseif(Key2==128)€        {€        Function=0€        }€    elseif(Key2==114)€ 99:"link"
